patthana15.70:1.1_0: Araṇaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.70:2.1_0: Saraṇaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.70:3.1_0: Araṇaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naaraṇo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.70:3.1_1: Araṇaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasaraṇo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.70:5.1_0: Araṇo abyākato dhammo naaraṇassa naabyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana15.70:5.1_1: Araṇo abyākato dhammo nasaraṇassa naabyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana15.70:6.1_0: Ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā anantare samanantare nissaye upanissaye purejāte vippayutte dve …pe… avigate dve.
